titles.title: Community-Based Workforce Development Act
Community-Based Workforce Development Act
To amend the Workforce Innovation and Opportunity Act to award grants to States to develop, convene, or expand industry or sector partnerships, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

bill.summary:
Community-Based Workforce Development Act
This bill provides grants to expand workforce training programs for high-skill, high-wage, or in-demand industry sectors.
